attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Recently I have noticed that there has been an increase in speed restricions thro' our villages. This is a good idea but it increases our travel journey times to and from our destinations. Because of this we need to increase the speed limit (i.e 60 mph) on our open roads.
It is not speed that kills it is bad driving and drivers that kill.
It would also stop the "Bunching up of traffic" on our roads.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
